page.title: 19Popular Games.
page.content: { MARBLES}We take turns in throwing our marbles at each other's marbles and if we hit them we are able to keep their marbles. Marbles are small brightly coloured spheres of glass. Each type has a different name eg. Chinese, Steelies, Americans, Moonies and Spiders. { SKIPPING}Two people hold a long rope and the rest of the group take turns to jump over it as it turns quickly. Sometimes we say a rhyme as we skip. Here is my favourite rhyme_ Polly in the kitchen , Doin' a little stitchin', In comes the bogey man, Boo, and out pops she. { DRAIN TIG}Someone is "it" and they chase the others and try to touch them.If you are touched you are "it". The only safe place where you cannot be caught is on top of a water drain.
